text: Name
Age
Occupation
Neighborhood
Rent or own?
How long have you lived in Seattle?
What is your favorite bus route?
Favorite musician or music group?
Favorite Seattleite, past or present?
Who did you vote for in Seattle's 2017 mayoral primary?
Should the Seattle Police Department be defunded by 50% or more during your mayoral term?
Should Seattle eliminate zoning that allows only single-family houses and instead allow multi-family housing on every block (beyond current allowances for accessory units)?
Should Seattle increase taxes on large corporations?
Would you support Seattle establishing poverty and behavioral health as defenses for certain misdemeanors?
Should the possession of all drugs be decriminalized in Seattle?
Were Seattle allowed by the state to enact rent control, would you support doing that?
Should police unions be allowed to engage in collective bargaining over accountability issues?
Would you support raising property and/or sales taxes during your mayoral term?
Would you vote for the proposed Compassion Seattle charter amendment, related to homelessness policies?
Should Seattle create municipal broadband?
Sum up your campaign in a tweet — no more than 140 characters.
Seattle recorded 50 homicides in 2020, most committed with guns. What would you do to address that?
Seattle has a stated goal of reducing greenhouse gas emissions 58% by 2030. How would you ensure the city gets there?
Rank these transportation modes from most to least important and explain why: walking, biking, transit, driving
Housing in Seattle has become unaffordable for many people. How would you change that?
Under what circumstances, if any, would the city under your direction remove an unsanctioned homeless encampment?
What would you do to change Seattle’s tax system, if anything, and why?
How would you work to ensure that Seattle’s workers and businesses thrive?
What would you do to address Seattle’s racial wealth gap?
How would you address Seattle's scarcity of affordable child care?
How much money should Seattle spend each year during your mayoral term to combat homelessness, and why?
